entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Cambridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 8:40 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.9°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -13.1°C
Wind: SW 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
